title: Nanjing: New China virus outbreak worst after Wuhan, says state media
content:
1. Nanjing: New China virus outbreak worst after Wuhan, says state media  BBC News
  2. Beijing reports first Covid case in 179 days as alarm grows over Nanjing Delta cluster  CNN

  5. City of Nanjing isolated as China fights worst Covid outbreak in months  The Guardian

localize.title: 南京。中国新型ウイルスの発生は武漢に次いで最悪と国営メディアが発表
